item.title: GEN CONT OFF Lights – Generator Operative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided associated EICAS message L(R) GEN OFF is verified to be operative.

numlitem.para: After engine start, verify associated engine generator is operating, and the L(R) GEN OFF EICAS message is extinguished.
If the associated generator is operative, select the generator OFF and observe the associated L(R) GEN OFF EICAS message illuminates.
Reset the associated engine generator and observe the associated EICAS message L(R) GEN OFF is extinguished.

placard.para: Placard Generator CONT OFF Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Start affected engine and verify associated L(R) GEN OFF EICAS message is extinguished.
If associated generator is operative, select the generator OFF and observe the associated L(R) GEN OFF EICAS message is displayed.
Reset the associated generator and observe the L(R) GEN OFF EICAS message is extinguished.
